column2: "Paul a wɔnam Nyankopɔn ne pɛ do wɔafrɛ no ayɛ no Jesus Kraest ɔsomafo
column5: "dze kɛma Nyankopɔn asɔr a ɔwɔ Korinte
column6: wɔ hɔn a wɔatsew hɔn ho wɔ Kraest Jesus mu afrɛ hɔn dɛ wɔmbɛyɛ ahotseweefo
column7: nye hɔn a wɔbɔ yɛnye hɔn nyina Ewuradze Jesus Kraest dzin wɔ mbea nyina no."

column2: "Adom nye asomdwee a ofi hɛn Egya Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest no nka hom."
"Meda me Nyankopɔn ase daa wɔ hom ho
column3: wɔ Nyankopɔn adom a wɔdze adom hom wɔ Kraest Jesus mu ntsi
column5: "dɛ adze nyina mu wɔama hom enya hom ho wɔ no mu
column6: wɔ kasahom nye nyimdzee nyina mu
column8: "dɛ mbrɛ Kraest ho dasedzi no etsim wɔ hom mu no;"

column2: "ama hom annka ekyir wɔ adom akyɛdze biara mu; ber a hom rotweɔn hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne nyikyerɛ no:"
"ɔno so na ɔbɛma hom etsim ekodu ewiei amma woeennhu mfom bi wɔ hom ho wɔ Ewuradze Jesus Kraest da no mu."
"Nyankopɔn a wɔnam no do afrɛ hom aba ne Ba hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest anyɛnkoyɛ mu no
"Afei
column4: menam hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne dzin do meserɛ hom dɛ hom nyina nka asɛnkor
column5: na mma mpaapaamu mmba hom mu
column6: na mbom hom nyina ndzi mu wɔ adwen kor nye tsirmsɛm kor mu."

column2: "Na
column4: hɔn a wofi Kloe fie ebeyi me hom ho asotsiw dɛ wentwiwentwi wɔ hom mu."

column2: "Dza mekyerɛ nye yi
"Ana wɔapaapaa Kraest mu? Ana Paul na wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu maa hom? Anaa Paul dzin mu na wonumaa hom hyɛe?"
"Meda Nyankopɔn ase dɛ mennuma hom mu bi gyedɛ dɛ Krispus nye Gaius
"amma obi aannka dɛ wonumaa hom hyɛɛ mankasa me dzin mu."
"(Ɛhɛɛ
column3: mekaa dɛ munumaa Stefanas fiefo: na nkaa no dze

column2: "Na nnyɛ dɛ Kraest somaa me dɛ mumbonuma ara bi
column3: na mbom dɛ membɛka asɛmpa no
column4: nnyɛ dɛ ɔkasanyansa mu ara bi
column5: amma Kraest mbeamudua no aannyɛ kwa."

column2: "Na mbeamudua no ho asɛm no yɛ nkwaseasɛm ma hɔn a wɔrehera
column3: na hɛn a wɔregye hɛn nkwa no dze
column4: ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn no tum ma hɛn."

column2: "Osiandɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column4: Na enyimdzefo nyimdzee no meyi no tokyen."

column2: "Onyansafo wɔ hen? Ɔkyerɛwfo wɔ hen? Wiadze yi mu okyingyefo wɔ hen? Ana Nyankopɔn nndaan wiadze nyansaa nkwaseasɛm bi?"
"Na Nyankopɔn nyansaa mu no
column3: wiadze ammfa nyansa do ennhu Nyankopɔn no
column4: ɔsɔɔ Nyankopɔn enyi dɛ ɔnam asɛnka no nkwaseasɛm no do bɛgye hɔn a wɔgye dzi nkwa."

column2: "Osiandɛ Jewfo rohwehwɛ asɛnkyerɛdze
"na hɛn dze
column3: yɛka Kraest a wɔbɔɔ no mbeamudua mu ho asɛm

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔafrɛ hɔn no dze
column5: Kraest yɛ Nyankopɔn no tum na Nyankopɔn ne nyansaa ma hɔn."

column2: "Osiandɛ dza ɔyɛ dɛ Nyankopɔn nkwaseadze yi yɛ nyansa kyɛn nyimpa ne nyansaa
column3: na Nyankopɔn n'adze a ɔyɛ mberɛw yɛ dzen kyɛn nyimpa dze."

column2: "Na
column4: hom nhwɛ hom frɛ no ara mpo ɛ
column5: dɛ hom nnyɛ honam afamu enyansafo pii

column2: "na wiadze nkwaseadze na Nyankopɔn apa dɛ ɔdze bɛhyɛ enyansafo enyito
column3: na wiadze mu dza ɔyɛ mberɛw na Nyankopɔn apa dɛ ɔdze bɛhyɛ dza ɔyɛ dzen enyito;"

column2: "na wiadze mu dza onnyi dzin
column3: nye dza wommbu no hwee na Nyankopɔn apa
column5: dɛ ɔdze bɛma dza ɔwɔ hɔ ayɛ kwa;"

column2: "amma honam biara aannhyehyɛ noho wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."
"Na Nyankopɔn mu na ofi na hom wɔ Kraest Jesus mu
column3: ɔno na wofi Nyankopɔn mu ayɛ no nyansa nye tsenenee

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column4: wɔmma ɔnhyehyɛ noho wɔ Ewuradze mu no."
